entry.tran: 无清偿能力的;资不抵债的;破产的
entry.def: A person or organization that is insolvent does not have enough money to pay their debts.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who has insufficient assets to cover their debts
1. unable to meet or discharge financial obligations;
